confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure that you want to delete your account? This will immediately log you out of your account and you will not be able to log in again.

hideNotificationDesc: When you clear this checkbox, a message will appear with its contents.
showNotificationDesc: When the checkbox is clicked, any notification will be displayed without any content.

searchModal.noResults: Can't seem to find what you're looking for?

clanLimitModal.createMessage: You've reached the maximum number of clans you can create on your account ({{count}} clans). To create a new one, you'll need to delete or leaving one of your existing clans.
clanLimitModal.joinMessage: You've reached the maximum number of clans you can join on your account ({{count}} clans). To join this new clan, you'll need to delete or leaving one of your existing clans.
